# Pull Request Template

Thank you for contributing to **Locust Telemetry**! üéâ

Please fill out the following sections to help us review your PR efficiently.

---

## Description

_Please include a brief description of your changes, what problem they solve, or what feature they add._

**Related issue(s) (if any):** #

---

## Type of Change

_Please check the relevant options:_

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Refactor / Code cleanup
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Tests / CI improvement
- [ ] Other (please describe): _______

---

## Checklist

_Please ensure your PR meets the following requirements:_

- [ ] All my code changes have been validated using the pre-commit hooks defined in `.pre-commit-config.yaml`.
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code.
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works.
- [ ] All new and existing tests pass (`pytest --cov=locust_telemetry`).
- [ ] I have updated the documentation if necessary (`README.md`, docstrings).
- [ ] I have linked any related issues or PRs.

---

## Description of Testing / How to Test

_Please describe how your changes were tested._

- Example: `pytest tests/ --cov=locust_telemetry`
- Example: Manual verification steps

---

## Additional Notes

_Please include any additional context, screenshots, or notes for reviewers._
